defaultRecipes.name: Homemade Pizza
defaultRecipes.recipe:
1. Roll out the pizza dough...
2. Spread tomato sauce...
3. Add cheese and pepperoni...
4. Bake in the oven...

defaultRecipes.name: Greek Salad
defaultRecipes.recipe:
1. Dice cucumbers and tomatoes...
2. Crumble feta cheese...
3. Combine all ingredients in a bowl...
4. Drizzle with olive oil...

defaultRecipes.name: Chocolate Brownies
defaultRecipes.recipe:
1. Mix flour and cocoa powder...
2. Cream butter and sugar...
3. Beat in eggs...
4. Bake in a preheated oven...

defaultRecipes.name: Caprese Salad
defaultRecipes.recipe:
1. Slice tomatoes and fresh mozzarella...
2. Arrange slices on a plate...
3. Tuck basil leaves between slices...
4. Drizzle with balsamic glaze...

defaultRecipes.name: Chicken Stir-Fry
defaultRecipes.recipe:
1. Cut chicken into bite-sized pieces...
2. Stir-fry chicken in sesame oil...
3. Add broccoli and bell peppers...
4. Mix in soy sauce, ginger, and garlic...

defaultRecipes.name: Quinoa Salad with Avocado
defaultRecipes.recipe:
1. Cook quinoa according to package instructions...
2. Dice avocado, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, and red onion...
3. Combine cooked quinoa and diced vegetables...
4. Squeeze lemon juice, drizzle olive oil, and season with salt and pepper...

defaultRecipes.name: Margherita Pizza
defaultRecipes.recipe:
1. Roll out the pizza dough...
2. Spread tomato sauce...
3. Arrange fresh mozzarella slices...
4. Tuck basil leaves on top...
5. Bake in the oven...

defaultRecipes.name: Vegetable Biryani
defaultRecipes.recipe:
1. Rinse and soak basmati rice...
2. Sauté spices in ghee...
3. Add mixed vegetables and rice...
4. Cook until rice is tender...

defaultRecipes.name: Lemon Garlic Shrimp
defaultRecipes.recipe:
1. Sauté minced garlic in butter...
2. Add shrimp and cook until pink...
3. Squeeze lemon juice over shrimp...
4. Garnish with chopped parsley...

defaultRecipes.name: Pasta Carbonara
defaultRecipes.recipe:
1. Cook spaghetti according to package instructions...
2. Beat eggs and mix with grated Parmesan...
3. Sauté pancetta until crispy...
4. Toss cooked pasta in egg mixture...

defaultRecipes.name: Vegetarian Tacos
defaultRecipes.recipe:
1. Heat tortillas in a skillet...
2. Fill with a mix of black beans, corn, and diced avocado...
3. Top with lettuce and salsa...
4. Serve warm...

defaultRecipes.name: Beef Stir-Fry
defaultRecipes.recipe:
1. Stir-fry beef strips in sesame oil...
2. Add broccoli and carrots...
3. Pour in soy sauce and toss until cooked...
4. Serve hot...

defaultRecipes.name: Berry Parfait
defaultRecipes.recipe:
1. Layer Greek yogurt, mixed berries, and granola in a glass...
2. Repeat layers until the glass is filled...
3. Drizzle honey on top...
4. Enjoy!

defaultRecipes.name: Banana Oat Pancakes
defaultRecipes.recipe:
1. Mash banana
2. Whisk in eggs, salt, and oats
3. Cook for about two minutes
4. Enjoy!
